title: I REALLY want to know how this system works.
body:
My mid lane sat AFK last game, and I was demoted. 

I was demoted for losing a 4v5...

I really want to know why it is that I was punished for losing an unfair game, my LP won't be given back to me even if that players gets punished. Im just so confused on why I've lost LP for someone else's decision.

Its actually silly.

replies.body:
because there is no better option. It is not possible to offer leaver protection without it becoming an easily exploitable bailout for premades, high-ELO players, and low-pop regions.

Just imagine the toxicity that would result if one person quitting on purpose would make the other 4 unable to lose LP, if the intentional exploits are not enough.

yeah, because people only afk due to them being terrible people and never because of things that are out of their control.
Hope you wont miss your account next time your ISP has a random outage or a bad hop.

Its ez.

In Ranked you only allow SoloQ

You get a mild Punishment (LP loss) for first offence in X set of time allowing for true bad connections and the punishment then ramps up from there.

You then adjust the whole Match to account for a 4v5, 3v5, 2v5, 1v5, 3v4,2v4,1v4,2v3,2v1 so if you are the underdog you dont lose as much to none and if you win as the underdog you gain more.   You also track in game chat (like they do know) and take into account any bullying/toxic behavior and then adjust LP again on the outcome of that.

Time spent by Riot building a system like this would do better for the health of the game then a new Lux Skin and in the end better game Health = more Skins bought.

Riot is spending their work Time on the quick buck in a game that has been out for 10 years.  Its the WRONG move but w/e.  I dont spend money on the game anymore because of these exact issues.

Except there are a ton of things wrong with that, starting with "you only allow SoloQ" and extending to the entire concept being exploitable and more or less worthless.

It already balances out, it is a nonissue unless you let confirmation bias get ahead of logic and reason.
Why do you gain LP when you win against an enemy? Should Riot also take away all the LP youâ€™ve won over the years because of enemy AFKs?
Hard truth it only takes 1 player to win but 5 players to lose, just saying. What's the diff if he was there but went 0 and 25 but you won ? Nothing
But for OP, it only tooke *4* players to lose. Hard truth. Just saying.
I'll explain often times when someone goes afk team just instantly loses hope and quits instead of trying to win. That's what happens

If you didn't lose LP for unfair games then climbing would be way too easy. Is it fair to lose LP in a game where teammates feed? No. Why should a 4v5 because of someone being AFK be treated differently from a 4v5 because your midlaner is 0/10?
